meanings.sent1: The team was triumphing after winning the championship.
meanings.sent2: She was triumphing in her math competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat was triumphing over the yarn ball.
meanings.sent4: The sun triumphed over the clouds, shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The flowers were triumphing in the garden, blooming beautifully.

meanings.definition: To rejoice or exult in success or victory
meanings.sent1: The fans were triumphing in the team's win.
meanings.sent2: He was triumphing over his high test score.
meanings.sent3: The children were triumphing over the ice cream they got.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter triumphed over the silence in the room.
meanings.sent5: The birds were triumphing in the freedom of the open sky.
